title: Start Now

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
> Start the end of someone's life.

> Start the night. One use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> Starting the end of someone's life deals a powerful attack to them at the end of the next night.

> Starting the night is a day ability. Starting the night ends the day and makes night start, nullifying any votes made after this action.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: > Have the good faction lose the game. (You can win while dead)

desc:
Post 2003
*This is what happens when <#970046125065265202> isn't locked in time.*
